Description.Text: With a passion for making every guest feel welcome, the Doubletree Guest Suites Times Square New York City offers luxurious accommodation and friendly services to ensure a relaxing stay in New York. Tourists can visit the city's popular museums, Museum Of Modern Art and The Frick Collection, while staying in the city. They can also explore the world's largest train station, Grand Central Station, which is in walking distance.

• Minskoff Theater - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi • Broadway - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi • Circle in the Square Theater - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi • Gershwin Theater - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi • Times Square - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi • Radio City Music Hall - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi • Ed Sullivan Theater - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 1 km / 0.6 mi • Chrysler Building - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi • Empire State Building - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi • Central Park - 3.2 km / 2 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi • Ellis Island - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi • Statue of Liberty - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi

Doubletree Guest Suites offers 460 two-room suites on floors eight through 43 of a 43-story building. Suites feature the Sweet Dreams® by Doubletree Sleep Experience bed: plush-top mattress, triple sheeting with 300-thread-count linens, a down comforter (bedspread), and oversized down pillows. Separate living rooms include flat-screen TVs, double sofa beds, and large desks with ergonomic chairs, and rollout tables for extra work space. Bedrooms have flat-screen TVs. Rooms offer wireless Internet access (surcharge), and guests can print from their laptop computers in their suites to the printer in the business center (surcharge). Bathrooms offer granite vanities, telephones, and shower/tub combinations with curved shower rods for extra room.

A premier Times Square hotel, the Doubletree Guest Suites Times Square boasts some of the largest hotel rooms in Midtown Manhattan. Soaring 45 floors above Times Square and the Broadway Theater District, This hotel is located in the most exciting part of New York City. Walk to popular New York attractions like Radio City Music Hall, Rockefeller Center, Madison Square Garden, Carnegie Hall, and world-class shopping. Times Square's TKTS Booth is right across the street from the hotel, where all can buy discounted, same-day tickets for Broadway and off-Broadway shows.

• Golf - driving range nearby • Ice skating nearby • Rowing or canoeing nearby • Swimming nearby • Racquetball/squash nearby • Running track/path nearby • Tennis nearby • Aerobics nearby • Pilates classes/instruction nearby • Yoga classes/instruction nearby • Hiking/biking trails nearby • Helicopter/airplane sightseeing nearby • Horse riding/rental nearby
• Check-in time is 3 PM • Check-out time is Noon

• From J.F.K. - Exit airport onto the Van Wyck Expressway North. Take the exit for the Grand Central Parkway West. Take the exit for the Long Island Expressway West. Expressway will feed into the Mid-Town Tunnel. When you exit the tunnel bear right following Uptown sign. At 3rd Avenue turn right. Drive up 3rd Avenue to 47th Street and make a left. Continue on 47th Street to the corner of 7th Avenue Turn left on 7th avenue, the hotel is on that corner, 47th St. & 7th Ave. If you are choosing to valet park your vehicle please pull up into the hotel’s loading zone located on the left side of 47th Street, between 6th and 7th Ave. Please do not pull-up directly in front of the hotel on 7th Avenue. Due to city traffic regulations you will be forced to circle around to the new hotel loading zone on 47th street.
• From La Guardia - Exit airport onto the Grand Central Parkway West. Take the exit for BQE Expressway West to the Long Island Expressway West. Expressway will feed into the Mid-Town Tunnel. When you exit the tunnel bear right following Uptown sign. At 3rd Avenue turn right. Drive up 3rd Avenue to 47th Street and make a left. Continue on 47th Street to the corner of 7th Avenue Turn left on 7th avenue, the hotel is on that corner, 47th St. & 7th Ave. If you are choosing to valet park your vehicle please pull up into the hotel’s loading zone located on the left side of 47th Street, between 6th and 7th Ave. Please do not pull-up directly in front of the hotel on 7th Avenue. Due to city traffic regulations you will be forced to circle around to the new hotel loading zone on 47th street.

• Gingers - Pays tribute to the “The Roaring Twenties”. Decorated in exotic Asian accents. Located on the fifth floor. Open for breakfast, lunch as well as pre- and post-theatre dinner. Serves an extensive menu with signature dishes and a la carte specialties.
• Ad Lib - Located in the main lobby on the third floor. Serves beverages and light fare pre and post-theatre. Open daily.
Love shopping and historic sight seeing? Welcome home to the Doubletree Guest Suites Times Square Major attractions and local shopping venues makes this the ideal travelers choice stay
